channel.title: admin on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet

item.description: Hi, I’m Bret. Read my CV, download a PDF copy, or download a two-page resume version. I am a Ph.D. candidate in Educational Psychology & Educational Technology at Michigan State University. I hold a Master’s Degree in Educational Technology and a Graduate Certificate in Serious Game Design and Research from Michigan State University, and a bachelorâ€™s degree in mathematics and sociology from Bucknell University. I consider my strongest credential to be my ongoing friendship with my very first online friend, who I met in an AOL chatroom in the early 1990s.
